cause.description:
As you most probably have heard through either the press, friends or online media, the African National Congress is trying to "unify" the South African sporting culture by abandoning the Springbok emblem, and most probably replacing it with a Protea outright.
The emblem, name and colours of our national rugby team has come a long way from the humble beginnings in 1906. If you want familiarize yourself with the history:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Africa_national_rugby_union_team
Join this cause to show your support for the Springboks; For the history of this great country!
